name: simd_double2
desc: A vector of two 64-bit floating-point elements.

items.name: func simd_make_double2(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector.

items.name: func simd_make_double2(simd_double3) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified three-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_double2(simd_double4) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified four-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_double2(simd_double8) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified eight-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_double2(Double, Double) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func vector2(Double, Double) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func simd_make_double2(Double) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_double2_undef(Double) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_char2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_uchar2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_short2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 16-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_ushort2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 16-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_int2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_uint2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_long2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 64-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_long2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 64-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_ulong2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 64-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_ulong2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 64-bit, unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_float2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 32-bit, floating-point elements.

items.name: func simd_double(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 64-bit, floating-point elements.

items.name: func simd_abs(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the absolute value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func abs(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the absolute value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_clamp(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func clamp(SIMD2<Double>, min: Double, max: Double) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func clamp(SIMD2<Double>, min: SIMD2<Double>, max: SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a vector is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second vector, and otherwise returns false.

items.name: func simd_fract(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the fractional part of each element in a vector.

items.name: func fract(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the fractional part of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_sign(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the sign of each element in a vector.

items.name: func sign(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the sign of each element in a vector.

items.name: func step(SIMD2<Double>, edge: SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns zero for each element in a vector less than a specified edge, and otherwise returns one.

items.name: func simd_step(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns zero for each element in a vector less than a specified edge, and otherwise returns one.

items.name: func simd_reduce_add(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in a vector.

items.name: func reduce_add(SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_max(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the maximum value in a vector.

items.name: func reduce_max(SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the maximum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_min(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the minimum value in a vector.

items.name: func reduce_min(SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the minimum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_smoothstep(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns an elementwise smoothly interpolated value between two vectors.

items.name: func smoothstep(SIMD2<Double>, edge0: SIMD2<Double>, edge1: SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns an elementwise smoothly interpolated value between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns an elementwise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns an elementwise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns an elementwise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns the maximum value of each element in a vector.

items.desc: Returns the minimum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func recip(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the reciprocal of each element in a vector.

items.desc: Returns the reciprocal of each element in a vector.

items.desc: Returns the fast reciprocal of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_precise_recip(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the precise reciprocal of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_rsqrt(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the reciprocal square root of each element in a vector.

items.name: func rsqrt(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the reciprocal square root of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_fast_rsqrt(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the fast reciprocal square root of each element in a vector.

items.name: func exp(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns e raised to the power of each element in a vector.

items.name: func exp2(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns 2 raised to the power of each element in a vector.

items.name: func exp10(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns 10 raised to the power of each element in a vector.

items.name: func expm1(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns eˣ-1 for each element in a vector.

items.name: func log(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the natural logarithm of each element in a vector.

items.name: func log2(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the base 2 logarithm of each element in a vector.

items.name: func log10(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the base 10 logarithm of each element in a vector.

items.name: func log1p(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns log(1+x) of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_cross(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double3
items.desc: Returns the cross product of two vectors.

items.name: func cross(SIMD2<Double>, SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD3<Double>
items.desc: Returns the cross product of two vectors.

items.name: func simd_dot(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the dot product of two vectors.

items.name: func dot(SIMD2<Double>, SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the dot product of two vectors.

items.name: func simd_incircle(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Tests if a double-precision point lies inside, on, or outside a circle.

items.name: func simd_normalize(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a vector pointing in the same direction of the supplied vector with a length of 1.

items.name: func normalize(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns a vector pointing in the same direction of the supplied vector with a length of 1.

items.name: func simd_fast_normalize(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the fast normalized vector.

items.name: func simd_precise_normalize(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the precise normalized vector.

items.name: func simd_orient(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Tests the orientation of the two supplied vectors.

items.name: func simd_orient(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Tests the orientation of the three supplied vectors.

items.name: func simd_project(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the first vector projected onto the second vector.

items.desc: Returns the first vector projected onto the second vector.

items.desc: Returns the fast projected vector.

items.name: func simd_precise_project(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the precise projected vector.

items.name: func simd_reflect(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the reflection direction of an incident vector and a unit normal vector.

items.desc: Returns the reflection direction of an incident vector and a unit normal vector.

items.name: func simd_refract(simd_double2, simd_double2, Double) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the refraction direction of an incident vector, a unit normal vector, and an index of refraction eta.

items.name: func refract(SIMD2<Double>, n: SIMD2<Double>, eta: Double) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the refraction direction of an incident vector, a unit normal vector, and an index of refraction eta.

items.name: func simd_norm_one(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the sum of the absolute values of a vector.

items.name: func norm_one(SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the sum of the absolute values of a vector.

items.name: func simd_norm_inf(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the maximum absolute value of a vector.

items.name: func norm_inf(SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the maximum absolute value of a vector.

items.name: func simd_length(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the length of a vector.

items.desc: Returns the fast length of a vector.

items.name: func simd_precise_length(simd_double2) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the precise length of a vector.

items.desc: Returns the square of the length of a vector.

items.name: func length_squared(SIMD2<Double>) -> Double

items.name: func distance(SIMD2<Double>, SIMD2<Double>) -> Double
items.desc: Returns the distance between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns the distance between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns the fast distance between two vectors.

items.desc: Returns the square of the distance between two vectors.

items.name: func acosh(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the inverse hyperbolic cosine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func asinh(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the inverse hyperbolic sine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func atanh(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent of each element in a vector.

items.name: func cosh(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func sinh(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the hyperbolic sine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func tanh(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_select(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_long2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the high-order bit of the corresponding element in the third parameter.

items.name: func simd_select(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_long2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the high-order bit of the corresponding element in the third parameter.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_long2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_long2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.

items.name: func cbrt(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the cube root of each element in a vector.

items.name: func ceil(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns the ceiling of each element in a vector.

items.name: func erf(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the error function for each element in a vector.

items.name: func erfc(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the complementary error function for each element in a vector.

items.name: func fma(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the multiply-add result for corresponding elements in three vectors.

items.name: func fmod(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the modulus after dividing each element in a vector by the corresponding element in a second vector.

items.name: func hypot(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the hypotenuse of a right-angled triangle with the sides that are adjacent to the right angle that two vectors define.

items.name: func lgamma(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the natural logarithm of the absolute value of the gamma function of each element in a vector.

items.name: func nextafter(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the next representable value of each element in a vector in the direction of the corresponding element in a second vector.

items.name: func pow(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector raised to the power of the corresponding element in a second vector.

items.name: func remainder(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the remainder after dividing each element in an array by the corresponding element in a second array of double-precision values.

items.name: func round(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector rounded to the nearest integer.

items.name: func simd_muladd(simd_double2, simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the multiply-add result for corresponding elements in three vectors.

items.name: func tgamma(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the gamma function for each element in a vector.

items.name: func trunc(SIMD2<Double>) -> SIMD2<Double>
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector rounded toward zero to the nearest integer.

items.name: func acos(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the arccosine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func asin(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the arcsine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func atan(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the arctangent of each element in a vector.

items.name: func atan2(simd_double2, simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the arctangent of each pair of corresponding elements in two vectors.

items.name: func cos(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the cosine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func cospi(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the cosine of each element in a vector multiplied by pi.

items.name: func sin(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the sine of each element in a vector.

items.name: func sinpi(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the sine of each element in a vector multiplied by pi.

items.name: func tan(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the tangent of each element in a vector.

items.name: func tanpi(simd_double2) -> simd_double2
items.desc: Returns the tangent of each element in a vector multiplied by pi.

items.name: func isfinite(simd_double2) -> simd_long2
items.desc: Returns true for each element that is finite in a vector.

items.name: func isinf(simd_double2) -> simd_long2
items.desc: Returns true for each element that is infinite in a vector.

items.name: func isnan(simd_double2) -> simd_long2
items.desc: Returns true for each element that is not a number (NaN) in a vector.

items.name: func isnormal(simd_double2) -> simd_long2
items.desc: Returns true for each element that is normal in a vector.
